com.guerzonica.app.picodom.pages

Class ProductsPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guerzonica.app.picodom.pages.base.Page
      • com.guerzonica.app.picodom.pages.base.ListPage<Product>
        • com.guerzonica.app.picodom.pages.ProductsPage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Toolbar.Listener

    public class ProductsPage
extends ListPage<Product>
    This is the page that handles the Product List page. It takes care to show all the products along with an image. Also,redirect user in the Amazon specific page of the selected Product or permits to delete that.
    Author:
    Singh Amarjot
    See Also:
    Page, ListPage, ProductsProvider
